title: Deploying Cisco CloudCenter Application Profiles with the REST API
slug: This Deploying Cisco CloudCenter Application Profiles with the REST API Learning Lab will guide you through the use of Cisco CloudCenter REST APIs to deploy a CloudCenter Application Profile for a UCS Managed Blade and the deployment of a Splunk Application Profile.

files.title: Deploy a UCS Bare Metal Server Application Profile
